comments: Khady is helpful and wants her students to do well. Her in class quiz\'s are easy, and her tests are just like the study guides. Go to class, get an A. Simple.
I really liked the class and Khady. She helped me a lot when I went to her office. I am going to major in Linguistics. miss you Khady!

Her accent makes her extremely hard to understand. I was really excited to take this class but I found myself wanting to skip it because it was so boring. Lots of people fell asleep. I can tell she knows her stuff but she seemed to have a hard time explaining it.
I love her! she knows many languages, I think Woluf, French and others. She is very nice too and I like her accent.

Khady is super smart and makes the class interesting. She often had to dumb material down & repeat herself for some students, which made the class go slowly. Her accent is noticeable but it never affected her teaching ability or my learning ability. She is very helpful if you have questions on the homework. Go to class, do the homework: easy A.

Interesting class. If you do the study guides and go to class then you\'ll be fine. The tests are pretty easy too and similar to the study guides. Don\'t bother buying the textbook, never opened mine.

She\'s really nice and really helpful. But kind of hard to understand, english isn\'t her first language. She\'s really intelligent but can\'t always spell words and i guess, it may just be my own fault, but hard for me to understand.
i think shes cool and teaches the material well. she is pretty flexible and works well with students
The teacher was very helpful, and very knowledgeable of the subject. I have learned a lot in that class.
she was very helpful and the topic was interesting.
Worst class so far at KU. Avoid at all costs.
